name: Kitty over the Rainbow
description:
Hi! I have created this game inspired by my dog, Sori. The main character is a cat though :-)  I hope you guys enjoy this game and find it interesting and fun. This will give you whole other feeling if you are a pet owner. But I'm sure you will get touched by this story even if you don't have any pets. 

*I recommend playing this game on the app "Spinoff" for smoother play and better background music 🎶
